snippet: Locked in a tight race just to make the playoffs, the Rangers will not repeat last season’s plan of resting goaltender Henrik Lundqvist to keep him fresh. They need him.
abstract: New York Rangers, clinging to last playoff spot in the Eastern Conference, are relying heavily on goaltender Henrik Lundqvist, who posted his first shutout of 2012-2013 season in latest game against New York Islanders.
lead_paragraph: Locked in a tight race just to make the playoffs, the Rangers will not repeat last season’s plan of resting goaltender Henrik Lundqvist to keep him fresh. They need him.

headline.seo: Rangers Pin Hopes on Henrik Lundqvist
headline.main: Rangers Pin Hopes on Goalie Henrik Lundqvist
headline.print_headline: As Always, Rangers Rely on Lundqvist to Make Stops and Save Them
